alert.note: Alert for Sanilac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sanilac County through 300 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Yale, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Croswell around 210 PM EDT. Applegate around 215 PM EDT. Carsonville around 220 PM EDT. Port Sanilac around 225 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Roseburg, Forester, Watertown, Valley Center and McGregor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
